data.title: Super-Index of Biography of Mathematicians
data.text:
This index was automatically generated using a new tagging program done by Simon Plouffe, CECM

Comprehensive index of the items cited in this paper, for each word a number of documents will lead you to relevant information. By clicking on an item it will launch an automatic search to Alta Vista.
